features.situation: to other's intimidation skill due to your size

tQ377-Rqfb3ayNU0k.name: Damage Resistance (Flexible; Tough Skin)
tQ377-Rqfb3ayNU0k.notes: Flexible (-20%, doesn't protect against crushing damage); Tough Skin (-40%, doesn't protect against touch or scratches)

features.situation: to HT rolls made for survival at -HP or below, and on any HT roll where failure means instant death. If this bonus makes the difference between success and failure, you collapse, apparently dead (or disabled), but come to in the usual amount of time. A successful Diagnosis roll reveals the truth.

t8Y6MHTT89uggDgK7.name: Longevity
t8Y6MHTT89uggDgK7.notes: You fail aging rolls only on a 17 or 18, or only on an 18 if your modified HT is 17 or better

tTdM0_uOdbbEaTfdG.name: Racial Quirk: Never forget a favour or an injury

tSK2iz077PvBIFake.name: Racial Quirk: Do not like to live underground

features.situation: from any employer of your craft skills

njj5qYreuNJTvK2Wy.text: Gnomes are close kin of the Dwarves and are somewhat shorter and slighter than their cousins (Gnomes are 2' shorter and 50lb heavier than a human of the same Strength).  They keep their beards trimmed close (whether this is an aesthetic decision or just a desire to be different from their racial kin, is a matter of some debate).
